greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Balanced ternary digital root of n.
reference: D. E. Knuth, The Art of Computer Programming, Addison-Wesley, Reading, MA, Vol 2, pp 173-175.
link: R. Zumkeller, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Digital Root
formula: a(n) = f(n) where f(n) = if n<-1 then f(-A065363(-n)) else (if n>1 then f(A065363(n)) else n).
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Oct 27 2007
